searchBarPlaceholder: Search for users using the Lucene syntax
noDevicesMessage: This user does not have any registered devices.
blockDialogMessage: Do you really want to block {username}? After doing so the user will not be able to log in anymore.
deleteDialogMessage: Do you really want to delete {username}? This will completely remove the user and cannot be undone.
changeEmailMessage: Do you really want to change the email for {username}?
changePasswordMessage: Do you really want to change the password for {username}?  You'll need a safe way to communicate the new password to your user, never send the user this new password in clear text.
resetPasswordMessage: Do you really want to reset the password for {username}?  This will send an email to the user allowing them to choose a new password.
removeMultiFactorMessage: Do you really want to remove the multi factor authentication settings for {username}?  This will allow the user to authenticate and reconfigure a new device.
resendVerificationEmailMessage: Do you really want to resend verification email to {username}?
unblockDialogMessage: Do you really want to unblock {username}? After doing so the user will be able to sign in again.
changeUsernameMessage: Do you really want to change the username for {username}?
